description:
Cole is 18 years old and he just graduated from high school. He was all smiles and his energy level was off the charts! We showed him around town and he was just non stop... climbing trees, running around, and frisbee!
For being so young, he's very confident with himself and his sexuality. He's got a lean, cut build from playing football in school. And when it comes to sex, he knows exactly what he wants. He likes men (yes!) who are big and muscular and he loves getting "man handled" when he's getting fucked. One thing is for sure — he does have a very fuckable ass!
title: Cole
